sentences.sentence: He foresees that his discovery will be used in more efficient domestic fridges.
sentences.translation: 他预计他的发现将被用于更高效的家用冰箱。

sentences.sentence: The new fridges will have the same features and usable space as conventional units.
sentences.translation: 新型冰箱将具有与传统冰箱相同的功能和使用空间。

sentences.sentence: It is reported that in many cities in Europe, many stores sell TCL televisions, Haier fridges and Lenovo computers.
sentences.translation: 据报道，在欧洲的许多城市，许多商店销售 TCL 电视，海尔冰箱和联想电脑。
